author: Special Correspondent
text:
Four fishermen of Kottaipattinam were arrested by the Sri Lankan Navy in the early hours of Thursday on the charge of trespassing the International Maritime Boundary Line.

Intecepted

The Sri Lankan Naval personnel reportedly intercepted their boat near Neduntheevu and arrested them.

They also seized the fishing nets.

The arrested were identified as L. Arockiaraj (54), L. Samuraj (26), R. Sivakumar (24) and I. Khaja (55).
title: Four fishermen arrested by Lankan Navy
